me.lihq.game.screen.elements

Class RoomTag

  • java.lang.Object
    • me.lihq.game.screen.elements.RoomTag

  • public class RoomTag
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is for the RoomTag that is to be displayed at the top left of the screen when a new room is entered.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private float animTime
      The current amount of time the animation has taken
      private float MAX_ANIM_TIME
      This is the amount of time it takes for the tag to both float in and float out.
      private float MAX_TIME_SHOWN
      The max amount of time the window should stay rendered onto the screen
      private com.badlogic.gdx.math.Vector2 position
      This is the position of the window relative to the top left of the window
      private java.lang.String roomName
      This is the room name it is to display
      private float timeShown
      The current amount of time the window has been shown.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      RoomTag(java.lang.String roomName)
      Initiate a new RoomTag.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void render(com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.SpriteBatch batch)
      This method renders the room tag to the provided SpriteBatch.
      void update()
      This method is called once per game tick.

    • Field Detail

      • roomName

        private java.lang.String roomName
        This is the room name it is to display

      • position

        private com.badlogic.gdx.math.Vector2 position
        This is the position of the window relative to the top left of the window

        The rendering calculation is done by the render method

      • MAX_ANIM_TIME

        private float MAX_ANIM_TIME
        This is the amount of time it takes for the tag to both float in and float out.

        The current amount of time the animation has taken

    • Constructor Detail

      • RoomTag

        public RoomTag(java.lang.String roomName)
        Initiate a new RoomTag. When the variable roomTag in NavigationScreen is NOT NULL, it is updated and rendered.
        Parameters:
        roomName - - The name to display.

    • Method Detail

      • render

        public void render(com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.SpriteBatch batch)
        This method renders the room tag to the provided SpriteBatch.

        It is called by the screens render method.

        Parameters:
        batch - - The SpriteBatch to draw the tag to

      • update

        public void update()
        This method is called once per game tick. It is used to control the animation of the tag.
